title: Master Production Support with UNIQ Technologies
subtitle: Become a job-ready Production Support Engineer with UNIQ Technologies. Learn real-time support operations, monitoring tools, incident management, SQL, UNIX, ticketing systems, log analysis, and automation skills used in top IT companies. Designed for freshers and IT job seekers aiming for stable, high-demand support roles.

afterCompleted.title: Job Opportunities after Production Support Course
afterCompleted.description: Production Support roles are among the most in-demand and easiest entry points for IT jobs. After completing our training, you can apply for roles such as:

whychoose.title: Real-Time Support Scenario Training
whychoose.description: Learn actual production issues, RCA, logs, alerts, downtime management, and on-call responsibilities.

whychoose.title: SQL + UNIX Included
whychoose.description: Master essential SQL queries and UNIX commands used daily by support engineers.

whychoose.title: Ticketing Tools Training
whychoose.description: Hands-on with ServiceNow/JIRA ticketing—incident, request, change, and problem management.

whychoose.title: Monitoring Tools
whychoose.description: Learn real-time monitoring tools such as Grafana, Kibana, CloudWatch basics, and alert handling.

whychoose.title: 100% Placement Support
whychoose.description: Dedicated placement team, mock interviews, technical revision, and daily job openings until you get placed.

whychoose.title: Beginner-Friendly
whychoose.description: No coding or technical background needed—ideal for freshers and career switchers.

whychoose.title: Industry Expert Trainers
whychoose.description: Learn from real Production Support engineers working in top MNCs.

whychoose.title: Internship Certification
whychoose.description: Receive a recognized Internship Certificate from UNIQ Technologies.

faq.question: What does a Production Support Engineer do?
faq.answer: A Production Support Engineer manages applications in live environments, handles incidents, monitors systems, resolves issues, analyses logs, runs SQL queries, checks UNIX systems, and ensures smooth application performance.

faq.question: Do I need coding knowledge?
faq.answer: No. Production Support mainly involves troubleshooting, SQL queries, UNIX commands, ticketing tools, and monitoring—not coding.

faq.question: Is Production Support a good career for freshers?
faq.answer: Yes! It is one of the easiest entry points into the IT industry, with strong job demand across MNCs.

faq.question: Do you teach tools like ServiceNow?
faq.answer: Yes. You will learn incident, request, change, and problem management using ServiceNow/JIRA.

faq.question: What technologies do I learn?
faq.answer: You will learn SQL, UNIX, shell scripting basics, monitoring tools, log analysis, ITIL concepts, and cloud basics for support.

faq.question: Do you provide placement support?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide 100% placement support until you get placed, including mock interviews and resume building.

faq.question: Can I shift from online to offline?
faq.answer: Yes. You can switch anytime without additional charges.

faq.question: Will I get certification?
faq.answer: Yes. You receive a Course Completion & Internship Certificate valid for IT job applications.
